duties_responsibilities.duty: Clean service, loaner, and gallery vehicles
Clean vehicle exteriors and interiors in compliance with company standards
Operate steamers, hoses, vacuums, and other equipment
Ability to spot check and manage paint correction onsite as needed
Track schedules, prioritize, and manage time effectively to meet deadlines
Communicate with various teams that are involved in the vehicle orientation process
Manage inventory and reorder supplies, as needed
Troubleshoot issues and escalate to management through appropriate channels when needed
Perform additional responsibilities as assigned to meet business needs
